description: Archived historical tasks retained for milestone traceability.

tasks.title: Finalize package layout migration and remove obsolete entry points.
Clean repository structure and align initial docs to new package layout.
Establish macOS visual runtime scaffold and rendering loop baseline.
Merge runtime foundation branch and validate baseline behavior on main.
Implement runtime safety controller with deterministic fail-safe paths.
Harden audit pipeline and confirm safety events are persisted correctly.
Implement platform variant routing for runtime/device-specific paths.
Standardize HDI phases and align instrumentation expectations.
Implement rendering fallback path for unsupported/unstable contexts.
Add smoke docs and GPU blit rendering path validation.
Add interactive plot module primitives for core dashboard views.
Integrate UI IR pipeline with plot module for dynamic updates.
Stabilize plotting interactions under streaming update conditions.
Integrate stream simulation path for reproducible telemetry playback.
Consolidate Discord operations assets into dedicated ops directory.
Update script/docs references after Discord ops reorganization.
Define packaging metadata and baseline build expectations.
Document Vulkan runtime preflight checks and troubleshooting guidance.
